programme.desc: Jake Tapper covers all the day's top stories around the country and the globe, from politics to money, sports to popular culture.

programme.title: World Sport
programme.desc: Daily sports show features major stories and issues making news in the world of sports.

programme.title: The Brief With Jim Sciutto
programme.desc: The best of CNN's reporting from correspondents across the world, to guide global audiences through the fast-paced news cycle with insight, analysis and hard-hitting interviews.

programme.title: Erin Burnett OutFront
programme.desc: Erin Burnett stays ahead of the headlines, delivering a show that's in-depth and informative.

programme.title: Anderson Cooper 360
programme.desc: Anderson Cooper takes you beyond the headlines with in-depth reporting and investigations.

programme.title: Bloomberg The Asia Trade
programme.desc: Live from Tokyo and Sydney with Shery Ahn and Haidi Stroud-Watts, getting insight and analysis from newsmakers and industry leaders on the biggest stories shaping markets.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The China Show
programme.desc: Your definitive source for news and analysis on the world's second-biggest economy. Hosted by Yvonne Man and David Ingles.

programme.title: Insight With Haslinda Amin
programme.desc: The definitive guide for global news audiences to get the complete picture on the biggest story of the day, through probing interviews and nuanced conversations.

programme.title: Bloomberg Horizons Middle East & Africa

programme.title: Bloomberg Daybreak: Europe
programme.desc: Live from London, we catch you up with overnight markets news from the US and Asia. Plus, we'll tell you what matters for investors in Europe, giving you insight before trading begins.

programme.title: Bloomberg: The Opening Trade
programme.desc: Everything you need to know as markets open across Europe. We break down today's biggest stories and speak to guests with skin in the game. Hosted by Anna Edwards, Guy Johnson and Kriti Gupta.

programme.title: The Pulse With Francine Lacqua
programme.desc: Conversations with high profile guests in the beating heart of global business, finance and politics. We go wherever the story is, bringing you exclusive interviews and market-moving scoops.

programme.title: Bloomberg Brief
programme.desc: Delivering the market news, data and analysis you need to set your agenda.

programme.title: Bloomberg Surveillance
programme.desc: Daily conversations with leaders and decision makers from Wall Street to Washington and beyond. Hosted by Jonathan Ferro, Lisa Abramowicz and Annmarie Hordern.

programme.title: Bloomberg Open Interest
programme.desc: Matt Miller, Katie Greifeld and Sonali Basak deliver the market-moving news you need to know to get a jump start on the US trading day.

programme.title: Bloomberg Tech
programme.desc: The only daily live technology program with a focus on breaking news, market-moving reporting and analysis of global technology companies and stories.

programme.title: Bloomberg Crypto
programme.desc: Bloomberg Crypto covers the people, transactions, and technology shaping decentralised finance. Your weekly source for the latest news, analysis and interviews with the most influential stakeholders.

programme.title: Bloomberg Markets
programme.desc: Bloomberg Markets is focused on bringing you the most important global business and breaking markets news and information as it happens.

programme.title: Bloomberg: Balance Of Power
programme.desc: Bloomberg Balance of Power focuses on politics and policies on Capitol Hill, in President Trump's administration, the federal agencies and the courts.

programme.title: Bloomberg Businessweek Daily

programme.title: Kingdom Of The White Wolf
programme.desc: As Winter approaches, the pack is running out of food and needs a fresh kill. White Scarf leads the pack in a successful hunt of a muskox calf, and ensures that the pups eat first. As the pack sleeps with full bellies, White Scarf limps away and doesn't return..

programme.title: Kingdom Of The Polar Bears
programme.desc: Dennis searches the Manitoba wilderness for a polar bear den in hopes of capturing the first moments of a cub‚Äôs life in the wild. .

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations

programme.title: Ultimate Animals Compilations
programme.desc: Pigs can detect smells buried two stories underground and a dog's nose can take you to court..

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: After 4 months of hibernation, the male prairie dogs in northern New Mexico emerge. While the females continue to sleep in the burrows, the males compete for supremacy outside. .

programme.title: Prairie Dog Manor
programme.desc: The warm weather has officially overtaken Northern New Mexico and that means it's officially mating season! In the Flatlands, Furgie must battle Brutus, once again, for the right to mate with a female that lives within the Alpha Dog's territory.

programme.title: Wild Mongolia: Compilation
programme.desc: Mongolia is a land forged from extremes. For millions of years, each of the unique animal species that inhabit this harsh climate have learned and evolved the skills to adapt and endure. Bactrian camels and sand wasps survive the punishing deserts, while wild horses and gazelles migrate across the vast grasslands, and scavengers search for their next meal along the jagged mountain ranges.

programme.title: Thailand's Wild Side
programme.desc: The need to breed drives all life across Thailand. Animals are pushed to their limits as they search for a mate and raise a family..

programme.title: Wild Vietnam
programme.desc: Travel to Vietnam's mountainous forests to discover endangered pangolins, Asian palm civets, and the golden-headed langurs of Cat Ba Island. The recently discovered Vietnamese crocodile lizard is already vulnerable to smuggling, while the critically endangered Delacour's langurs take refuge in a nature reserve. In springtime, an astonishing diversity of butterfly species congregates in the forest.

programme.title: Wild Vietnam
programme.desc: Travel to southern Vietnam's tropical habitats, home to gibbons and playful macaques, green sea turtles, and Asian black bears. Reintroduced Siamese crocodiles roam the Bau Sau wetlands. The vast Mekong Delta boasts small-clawed otters and thousands of migrating birds, from openbill storks to Oriental darters.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: We start on the tiny island of Batan, meeting a unique viper and a ubiquitous but also giant, land crab. Luzon is the main island of the Philippines. We drop in to Mindoro to see the most endangered large mammal in the Philippines, the tamaraw.

programme.title: Untamed Philippines
programme.desc: Moving from turtles of the Palawan coast to the unique National Marine Park at Tubbataha, to meet giants, whale sharks and manta rays. We also see how people can mediate between people and wildlife as we join a snake hunting team catching and translocating a deadly Samar cobra.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Tricky cases need PVS treatment during a spooky Halloween season! Dr. Pol aids a pot-bellied pig that was attacked by two dogs. A descendant of racehorse Secretariat has a problematic ear issue. A stalled laboring Lab brings a bunch of adorable puppies into the world. And, Dr. Pol helps a sweet kitten find a new home.

programme.title: The Incredible Dr. Pol
programme.desc: Doc Pol offers relief to a blind Jack Russel and helps a dairy cow stuck in labor. Later, the good doctor searches for footing after an amped up Angus sends him airborne. programme.title: Wonders Of The Ocean
programme.desc: Pacific Islands range from coral atolls and smoking volcanoes to pieces of a lost continent. Discover the wildest stories of adaptation and survival on these Islands of Life..
